home.title: Welcome
home.text1: Agali Studios rentals is a family business that started in 2025.
home.text2: It is located by the sea on the provincial road Aidipsos-Lichados, a few minutes by car from the port of Loutra Aidipsou or Agiokampos. In Loutra Aidipsou you can do your shopping and go out for food and drinks.
home.text3: The accommodation consists of a total of 4 double apartments with balconies. They are all fully furnished and have everything the visitor needs for a pleasant stay. From the balcony, you can enjoy the sea view, while in our garden you can sit at the gazebo next to the olive trees.
home.cardSubtitle1: Paradise with turquoise waters and unique natural beauty
home.cardSubtitle2: Natural refuge with golden sand and enchanting tranquility
home.cardSubtitle3: Natural therapy through the hot thermal springs of Evia
home.cardSubtitle4: Combination of history, faith, and serenity
home.sightsDesc: Explore the beautiful landscapes and sights around our rentals.
home.roomsDesc: Comfortable and welcoming rooms for unforgettable moments of relaxation.

accommodation.title: Our Studios
accommodation.text1: Our studios of 20 sq.m. with a queen bed are ideal for two people/couples. They are fully furnished and equipped with electrical appliances to ensure a comfortable stay and to enjoy your holidays in our area.
accommodation.text2: Specifically, they have a refrigerator, cooking hobs, built-in oven, kettle, and toaster.
accommodation.text3: Additionally, they are equipped with plates, glasses, cutlery, and basic cooking utensils that you can use during your stay.
accommodation.text4: Finally, all apartments have their own bathroom with shower, towels, and personal hygiene items.
accommodation.text5: The spacious balcony has chairs and a table so you can enjoy your breakfast with a view of the North Evoikos Gulf.
